resources.string: PHL Control is the complement of Micro GSM Key developed by PHL Technology, with the equipment installed and this app you can control and supervise automatic gates and doors, lights, water pumps, alarms, motors etc.
Remember, you must have installed a GSM Key in order to use PHL Control correctly
You have to know the GSM Key number in order to configure this app correctly, you can pick the number from the directory.
Tap continue and accept the permission of this app to configure PHL Control correctly
Google play\'s politics does not allow automatic sms. When you push the buttons you will be redirected to sms default application. We apologize to you for any inconvenient that this may cause.
